acceptRepaymentPlan: Applicant accepts the defendant's repayment plan (for LiP 1v1 the case must remain online).
agreePartAdmitSettle: Claimant confirms the part-admission offer settles the dispute.
allAgreedToLrMediationSpec: In a SPEC small claim all represented parties have agreed to legal representative mediation (and no party has opted out).
allResponsesReceived: Every required defendant response has been received
applicantOutOfTimeNotBeingTakenOffline: Claimant response deadline has passed with no response and staff have not taken the case offline.
applicantOutOfTimeProcessedByCamunda: Automation has already processed the out-of-time applicant response.
awaitingResponsesFullAdmitReceived: In a 1v2 two-solicitor case only one defendant has responded with a full admission and the second is outstanding.
awaitingResponsesFullAdmitReceivedSpec: SPEC analogue: only one defendant has submitted a full admission and the matching response from the other side is pending.
awaitingResponsesFullDefenceReceived: In a 1v2 two-solicitor case only one defendant has provided a full defence and the other is yet to respond.
awaitingResponsesFullDefenceReceivedSpec: SPEC analogue: one defendant has filed a full defence and the paired response is pending.
awaitingResponsesNonFullDefenceOrFullAdm: In a 1v2 two-solicitor case a single defendant has responded with something other than full defence/admission while the co-defendant is outstanding.
SPEC analogue: a non full-defence/admission response was received while the paired response is still outstanding.
bothDefSameLegalRep: Both defendants share the same legal representative.
caseDismissedAfterClaimAcknowledged: Claim was acknowledged but the response deadline has expired without a response and staff have not intervened.
caseDismissedAfterDetailNotified: Claim details notification deadline expired with no response or staff action.
caseDismissedAfterDetailNotifiedExtensio: Claim details notification deadline expired while an extension applied and no responses or staff action occurred.
caseDismissedPastHearingFeeDue: Hearing fee due date has passed without payment.
casemanMarksMediationUnsuccessful: Mediation service recorded the session as unsuccessful.
ccjRequestJudgmentByAdmission: Applicant has requested a CCJ by admission.
certificateOfServiceEnabled: Certificate of Service workflow is enabled for this case.
claimDetailsNotified: Claim details have been successfully notified.
claimDismissedByCamunda: Camunda automation has already dismissed the claim.
claimIssued: Claim has been issued (a notification deadline exists).
claimNotified: Claim notification has been sent (acknowledgement deadline exists).
contactDetailsChange: Contact details change event has been triggered on the case.
counterClaim: Latest defence is a counter claim (unspecified journey).
counterClaimSpec: Latest defence is a counter claim for SPEC.
demageMultiClaim: Allocated track is multi-track for an UNSPEC claim.
divergentRespondGoOffline: Defendant responses diverge so the case must go offline.
divergentRespondGoOfflineSpec: SPEC defendant/claimant responses diverge so the case must go offline.
divergentRespondWithDQAndGoOffline: Responses diverge and discrete directions questionnaires must be produced before going offline.
divergentRespondWithDQAndGoOfflineSpec: SPEC divergent responses requiring DQs before going offline.
fullAdmission: Latest defence is a full admission (unspecified).
fullAdmissionSpec: Latest defence is a full admission in SPEC.
fullAdmitPayImmediately: SPEC 1v1 full admission where the defendant proposes to pay immediately and claimant has not decided whether to proceed.
fullDefence: Latest defence is a full defence (unspecified).
fullDefenceNotProceed: Claimant indicates they do not wish to proceed against the defendant(s).
fullDefenceProceed: Claimant elects to proceed against the defendant(s).
fullDefenceSpec: Latest defence is a full defence in SPEC.
isCarmApplicableCase: Case meets CARM pilot criteria for represented parties in SPEC small claims.
isCarmApplicableLipCase: Case meets CARM pilot criteria for LiP participation in SPEC small claims.
isClaimantNotSettleFullDefenceClaim: Claimant indicates they will not settle after a full defence.
isClaimantNotSettlePartAdmitClaim: Claimant indicates they will not settle after a part admission.
isClaimantSettleTheClaim: Claimant indicates the claim has been settled.
isDefendantNoCOnlineForCase: Defendant Notice of Change online feature flag is active for this case.
isDefendantNoCOnlineForCaseAfterJBA: Case is LiP with an active judgment by admission and a post-judgment Notice of Change has occurred.
isDefendantNotPaidFullDefenceClaim: Claimant states the defendant has not paid the amount ordered on a full defence outcome.
isInHearingReadiness: Hearing has been listed and the case is in hearing readiness (no dismissals/taken offline).
isLiPvLRCase: Case is LiP v represented (one party self-represented and the other legally represented) in a 1v1.
isLipCase: Case is LiP v LiP in a 1v1 scenario.
isPayImmediately: Defendant has proposed to pay the admitted amount immediately.
isRespondentSignSettlementAgreement: Defendant has signed the digital settlement agreement.
isTranslatedDocumentUploaded: Translated response documents have been uploaded.
lipFullDefenceProceed: LiP claimant has opted to proceed following a full defence response.
nocSubmittedForLiPApplicant: Notice of Change submitted for a LiP claimant.
nocSubmittedForLiPDefendant: Notice of Change submitted for a LiP defendant.
nocSubmittedForLiPDefendantBeforeOffline: LiP defendant submitted a Notice of Change before the case went offline.
notificationAcknowledged: At least one defendant has acknowledged service (per scenario rules).
oneVsOneCase: Case is a single claimant v single defendant matter.
onlyInitialRespondentResponseLangIsBilin: Respondent marked their response as bilingual but has not requested ongoing bilingual processing.
partAdmission: Latest defence is a part admission (unspecified).
partAdmissionSpec: Latest defence is a part admission in SPEC.
partAdmitPayImmediately: Defendant offered to pay the part-admitted amount immediately and claimant accepted.
pastClaimDetailsNotificationDeadline: Claim details notification deadline has expired.
paymentFailed: Card payment failed for the claim issue fee.
paymentSuccessful: Card payment succeeded for the claim issue fee.
pendingClaimIssued: Case ready to move from payment success to pending issue (represented defendants with registered orgs).
pendingClaimIssuedUnrepresentedDefendent: At least one defendant is unrepresented (with scenario-specific rules) so the LiP pending issue state applies.
pinInPostEnabledAndLiP: PIN-in-Post feature is enabled and the defendant is a LiP.
reasonNotSuitableForSdo: Claimant flagged that the case is not suitable for an SDO.
rejectRepaymentPlan: Applicant rejected the defendant’s repayment plan (and case remains online for LiP 1v1).
respondent1OrgNotRegistered: First defendant is represented but their organisation is not registered.
respondent2OrgNotRegistered: Second defendant is represented but their organisation is not registered.
respondentTimeExtension: A defendant has obtained a time extension to respond.
specClaim: Case is in the SPEC (damages) service.
takenOfflineAfterClaimDetailsNotified: Claim was taken offline because not all defendants were notified of claim details online.
takenOfflineAfterClaimNotified: Claim was taken offline after notification but before claim details were served.
takenOfflineAfterNotSuitableForSdo: Claim flagged as not suitable for SDO and taken offline.
takenOfflineAfterSDO: Claim was taken offline after directions (SDO) were drawn.
takenOfflineByStaff: HMCTS staff have manually taken the case offline.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterClaimDetailsNoti: Staff took the case offline after claim details were notified (and before any responses/time extensions).
Staff took the case offline after claim details were notified while an extension was active.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterClaimIssue: Staff took the case offline between claim submission and issue.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterClaimNotified: Staff took the case offline after notification but before claim details were served.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterClaimantResponse: Staff took the case offline after claimant response but before an SDO was drawn.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterDefendantRespons: Staff took the case offline after a defendant response and before claimant action.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterNotificationAckn: Staff took the case offline after service acknowledgement and before defence/extension.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterSDO: Staff took the case offline after an SDO was drawn.
takenOfflineByStaffBeforeClaimIssued: Staff took the case offline before the claim was issued.
takenOfflineByStaffBeforeMediationUnsucc: Staff took the case offline before mediation recorded an outcome.
takenOfflineBySystem: System automatically took the case offline (for example because of representation changes).
takenOfflineSDONotDrawn: Case was taken offline because it was marked not suitable for an SDO.
takenOfflineSDONotDrawnAfterClaimDetails: Case marked not suitable for SDO and taken offline after claim details notification.
Case marked not suitable for SDO and taken offline during a claim-details extension.
takenOfflineSDONotDrawnAfterNotification: Case marked not suitable for SDO and taken offline after service acknowledgement.
caseDismissedAfterClaimAcknowledgedExten: Claim was acknowledged, an extension applied, and the dismissal deadline passed without response or staff action.
takenOfflineByStaffAfterNotificationAckn: Staff took the case offline after acknowledgement while a time extension was in play.
takenOfflineSDONotDrawnAfterNotification: Case marked not suitable for SDO and taken offline after acknowledgement while an extension applied.
claimSubmittedOneRespondentRepresentativ: Single defendant representative covers all parties.
claimSubmitted1v1RespondentOneUnregister: 1v1 claim where the respondent representative is not registered.
claimSubmittedTwoRegisteredRespondentRep: Two defendants, both represented by registered organisations.
claimSubmittedTwoRespondentRepresentativ: Two defendants with separate representatives, one organisation unregistered.
claimSubmittedBothUnregisteredSolicitors: Both defendant solicitors are unregistered organisations.
